Title: Prohibits a person who has abandoned such person's spouse or domestic partner from collecting any portion of the spouse's or domestic partner's pension
Summary: Prohibits a person who has abandoned such person's spouse or domestic partner from collecting any portion of the spouse's or domestic partner's pension.
LawCode: Add ยง212, Dom Rel L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law, in relation to prohibiting a person who has abandoned such person's spouse from collecting any portion of the spouse's pension
